attributes.action: An review of the number of houses in Thanet Kent.
attributes.additional_details: Our infrastructure  can not cope and our drug and crime levels are rising it will effect our living conditions and our safety.
attributes.background: To stop the amount of houses to be  built in Thanet as our infrastructure can not cope as it is.

rejection.details:
Decisions about planning and housing in Thanet are a matter for Thanet District Council, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can find out how to petition Thanet District Council here: https://www.thanet.gov.uk/info-pages/petition-the-council/

You could also contact a local councillor about this. Find your local councillors here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
